name: Oslo Flyveklubb
about: Oslo Flyveklubb, located at Kjeller Flyplass in Norway, has a rich history of qualifying private pilots since the 1950s. The flight school offers affordable flight hours and emphasizes safe flying practices. They provide training for the Private Pilot License (PPL-A) and annual support courses in theoretical subjects. With a focus on making the path to a pilot's license as efficient as possible, Oslo Flyveklubb is a reliable choice for aspiring pilots. Their experienced instructors and supportive environment ensure a comprehensive and safe learning experience. Join Oslo Flyveklubb to start your aviation journey with confidence.
